title: Coronavirus (COVID-19): A Biblical Perspective
cleaned_text:
Coronavirus (COVID-19) is a serious issue. Since appearing as a dangerous pneumonia in December 2019, coronavirus has dominated the headlines due to health, economic, and spiritual implications. Just as the Spanish flu epidemic ravaged the country a century ago, so this generation will be talking about COVID-19 for years to come.
